h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: He can also dive at you in a diving tackle that can be very damaging if it lands, and you'll need to dodge as he lands, but be ready for him to rise up and turn to hit you with his hind legs in a mule kick attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
He can also dive at you in a diving tackle that can be very damaging if it lands, and you'll need to dodge as he lands, but be ready for him to rise up and turn to hit you with his hind legs in a mule kick attack.
